verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came כְּכַלֹּתוֹ֙ <WH3615> ke-chal-lo-To And it came to pass when he had made an end לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> le-dab-Ber of speaking אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, unto Saul וְנֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> ve-Ne-fesh that the soul יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> ye-Ho-na-Tan, of Jonathan נִקְשְׁרָ֖ה <WH7194> nik-she-Rah was knit בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> be-Ne-fesh with the soul דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> da-Vid; of David; וַיֶּאֱהָבֹו vai-ye-'e-ha-vov כוַיֶּאֱהָבֵ֥הוּ <WH157> vai-ye-'e-ha-Ve-hu loved קיְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan and Jonathan כְּנַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> ke-naf-Sho. him as his own soul
